title: White Christmas Cake
ingredients: ['175g candied pineapple pieces', '425g sultanas', '250g glace cherries', '150g dried currants', '50g candied orange peel', '50g candied citron', '125ml orange juice', '450g butter', '475g icing sugar', '8 eggs, separated', '425g pecans, chopped', '375g sifted plain flour']
